item.description:
In celebration of our tenth anniversary, ChIME invites you to a ceremony and celebration, honoring Earth. Come renew your spirit and connect with others who share your passion for Earth renewal.
Doors open at 3:45 -the ceremony begins at 4:15. Afterwards there will be food and social time. The event is free and open to the public. Donations are appreciated.

EarthRite is a multi-media, participatory experience intended to renew planetary commitment and nourish the spirit, regardless of religious affiliation. We will join together in celebration and sorrow, dancing and singing, meditation and prayer.
Singers from the Portsmouth-based Voices from the Heart women's chorus and musicians from Sacred Sound and Energy will participate in EarthRite, along with community representatives from Buddhist, Christian, Islamic, Hindu, Jewish, Native American, Pagan and other spiritual paths. In addition, many of the artistic gifts of ChIME students and graduates will be showcased.
item.name: EarthRite
